Description.Chinese: 项目的研究成本限制最高为 50 倍。所以 25k 普通、50k 罕见、100k 稀有、250k 史诗、500k 传奇。
Description.English: Researching Items has a researchcosts limit of 50 times the costincrease. So 25k Common, 50k Uncommon, 100k Rare, 250k Epic and 500k Legendary.
Description.French: Researching Items has a researchcosts limit of 50 times the costincrease. So 25k Common, 50k Uncommon, 100k Rare, 250k Epic and 500k Legendary.
Description.German: Items zu erforschen hat nun ein maximales Limit an Forschungskosten von 50* der Kostensteigerungn. Also 25k Gewöhnlich, 50k Ungewöhnlich, 100k Selten, 250k Episch und 500k Legendär.
